name: Patrolling Guard
title: Patrolling Guard
description: A watchful figure keeping an eye on the path to the watchtower.

personality.goal: To navigate the complexities of life in Shadowfen while accumulating enough resources to secure a more stable existence beyond the swamp.
personality.fear: The constant threat of betrayal from former allies and the danger of being outsmarted by the criminals he once pursued.
personality.secret: He once participated in a dangerous trade, fearing the repercussions of his actions as whispers of his involvement circulate.
personality.speech_pattern: Speaks in a low, gravelly tone, often using pragmatic expressions and street slang. Tends to mumble when anxious, reflecting a cautious demeanor.
relationships: Owes a favor to Talia, the local informant, who has valuable information that could either help or harm him.
Respects Captain Hargan but feels a mix of admiration and pressure due to the captain's authoritative presence.
Maintains a wary alliance with Rook, a former thief whose resourcefulness is both a blessing and a reminder of past choices.

nod: The Patrolling Guard gives you a brief, professional nod while continuing to scan the area.
wave: The Patrolling Guard acknowledges your wave with a curt nod.
